ValidationRule.description: case #23189431 for ESR Service Support rcd type, if Action is 1 of 3 values you must also put in Processing Type. Merged with validation rule ESR_Conversion_Processing_Type.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(NOT(BEGINS( $Profile.Name ,'System Admin')), RecordType.Name = 'Service Support ESR Case', OR(ISPICKVAL(Action__c ,'Transferred to Conversions'), ISPICKVAL(Action__c,'DSR Updated Yes Report'), ISPICKVAL(Action__c,'Transferred to Processing'), ISPICKVAL(Action__c,'Update/Changes YE')), ISBLANK(TEXT(Processing_Type__c)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Processing Type is required based on your Action field value.
